projects.project_description: Personal project to learn Nextjs 13 and other technologies, such as data abstraction with prisma, mongodb for storage, and nextauth for authentication.
League Pro Data is your go-to destination for comprehensive analysis of competitive and solo queue games in the world of League of Legends.
Website for an e-commerce store focused in furniture, made with React, bootstrap, sketch, context API, routing, hooks and custom hooks.
Landing page for an electric car dealership, focused on a minimalistic proffesional look. Hooks and framer motion used.
Landing page for money transfer business, made in React with hooks and bootstrap. Design built in figma from a wireframe to a high fidelity design.
